snippet: Shares in emerging economies fell again as investors braced for the phasing out of an American central bank stimulus program that has shored up markets for the past few years.
lead_paragraph: Shares in emerging economies fell again as investors braced for the phasing out of an American central bank stimulus program that has shored up markets for the past few years.

headline.main: Stocks in Emerging Markets Take Brunt of Fed Fears
headline.print_headline: Emerging markets take brunt of Fed tapering fears
